_sText:
Surf_prime_time

-The sequel to surf_hang_time-

By ZaLoS

custom textures by ZaLoS

keypad prefab off of source sdk docs

Prime time, the sequal to hang time. In this map I tried to fuse old school surf with the new. In addition I wanted to put some major conflict in this map, thus there are plenty of places to kill each other, from the platforms to the ramps, you should have no problem getting some action. 

Stage 1:

An arena style surf. Circle endlessly if you like, killing as you go.

Stage 2:

A linear surf. This is intended to allow you to get some on the ramp kills or some sniper shots. Use the spining circle to circle back and try to get some more ramp kills. 

Stage 3:

This stage is a short surf with the jail and bombsite as the main focus.

!:

:D


Special thanks to Buck Nasty for the texture scheme from hang_time_reloaded, and setting up the beta, and the beta testers! more thanks to papercut for mapping advice, and www.fpsbanana.com and solidsurf.info 

note: This map is not intended for deathmatch servers. Its is recomended to be surfed at sv_airaccelerate 150/-66 tic/with noblock mod installed. 

This map was compiled in HDR. If you dont like HDR you can still play! just type mat_hdr_enabled 0 in console to turn it off! mat_hdr_enabled 1 to turn it back on :)

Surf_Presmon An Easy/Medium skill surf map with 6 levels ( No bonuses ), set to the 5 minutes timer, every stage has different textures and themes, and the fift level is a bit different than the others! Thanks Goes to! Bravesurf/PW Clan = For beta testing server Karatekafer = Skybox Texture ( Mpa110 ) Billy and Exither = "Help along the way". Good Luck in this map, hope u like it! Check out at forums.solidsurf.info! And thx to all beta testers to find bugs... ==== Little Update, but it makes all the difference, i fixed the timer, it wasnt working ;)

right: opens the noob box

Added a real skybox and lighting, removed the black fog, and textured everything. The gameplay itself has not been altered.

Link to a tutorial for the surf_pox teleport effects. ATTENTION ++++ PLEASE READ ************************* Hello, I'd like to present my newest creation surf_pox. I've got something to say about this map to prevent flaming. Firstly: The map size is very large! You can NOT play this map without having fastdownload (bz2) activated. Why it is that large? Well I'm only 10 lights below the maximum. I know this, so I don't want to read it in the cons. Secondly: This map is dark. Yarly. I know it, you don't need to tell me. I WANT it like this. The darkness is NO POINT OF CRITISM if you rate this map, but the look overall is. Comments like "this map is too dark for me" are not wanted here, I'll also write this to the feedback instructions. Thirdly: This map is created for 66 tick servers. I guess it will run on 100 tick servers fine aswell, but in the beta tests I noticed that under 33 tick some ramps are glitchy. Please do not flame about this! Fourthly: You should not play this map in an RPG-similar mod, as in the jail you do not have anything more than a knife and a grenade all 8 seconds. Also this is not a rebel resistance rip-off or whatever (w00t). ************************* ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ATTENTION If you got lag on this map, please turn of your HDR. ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: These three points are the reason for a late release. I want you to be fair. Credits go out to Pariah and Karatek√§fer. I did only add two screenshots, because it's hard to take good ones here, as the ramps are the main event. Please watch the youtube video instead! Have fun with this new design. Link to a tutorial for the surf_pox teleport effects.

As always have fun :D

No description

Linear map Tier 4[?]/5 ~1min

3 Bonuses

First map ESA

**SURF_PLAGUELANDS_BETA5i**
  ¬ªThis map has 6 stages, 1 bonus, a no-win
    jail and a win jail.

  ¬ªThe no-win system is set up so when the 6 
    minute timer fires, it separates the people 
    in each stage to a corresponding box, once
    in the box you are presented with two buttons
    that are covered with glass. Stage 1 box has
    no buttons. Once the people in box 2 press 
    a 1 of the 2 buttons the people in box one
    will either be spared, or dropped to their
    death. This process continues on to box 6.
    Once the process finishes, you are teleported
    to a mini jail where you are given weapons 
    depending on the stage you were on.

  ¬ªWhen you beat the map you are given an XM1014
    (see autoshotty) with infinite ammo, which
    means no reloading. The people who have "failed"
    have their speed reduced to 75% of normal
    run/walk speed. You can either kill them with
    the XM1014 or you can kill them with Nuclear
    Sanitation... just make sure you stay behind
    the blast doors or you will be vaporized!

  ¬ªThe bonus is rather difficult, which is a good
    thing for a number of reasons. Upon completion
    of bonus you are given a knife, when you push
    "E" while holding the knife you are brought to
    a room with 6 doors, a door for each stage.
    Once you go to a stage, you can return to the 
    room by pushing "E" again. Go crazy.

  ¬ªYou are also given the option to kill yourself
    at anytime with the easy suicide doors in every
    stage.

  ¬ªDon't let the map discourage you :]

I would also like to thank: Junior for his crazy hard bonus!
All the people making extremely hard skill maps, they inspired
me to make this map. It was supposed to be the hardest map ever
but it turned into something much different. 
And how could I forget, ChaoZ for his sexy toxic texture, thanks bud!

Our first map released. This map is based on ideas from 10x_final and other [outdoor] surf maps. We fixed all bugs except for some minor that dont involve gameplay. Features: Spawn with unbreakable glass, almost no spawn-nading, jail, secret spots for advanced surfers, balanced weapon rations, ROTATING jail camera, and more!\
Contact: privateftw@gmail.com or http://z11.invisionfree.com/MotEclan/ OR radicalmote (=xfire account)
Open combat surf map, yes?

Before we get started, I'd like to point out that my intention was not to make the map look better, but to clean it up. Keep this in mind when assessing please.

Surf_perforated, commonly known as a map with bugs, ramp glitches and crappy brushwork (no offence Keeka), but to me also a great and challenging map. I could not let this map end up in the trashcan, so here I am releasing this remake. This remake is a complete remake from scratch. Nothing has been copy pasted, the only resemblance is the gameplay, somewhat the texture scheme and the dimensions. Also bear in mind that this might be a tad easier/harder than the original, since it was a hard task correctly mapping the dimensions right. Many parts were off-grid. 

The goal is, ofcourse, to make it to the end of the 5 stages. The timer is set to 5 minutes. The first to make it to the end, gets to win a nice but simple smash-your-enemies-game. Also there will be a machinegun and a flashbang ready for you.

If no-one makes it to the end in time, everybody gets teleported to a knife arena, with obstacles from my gg map goodies (which most of you probably won't know :p). 

Thanks to Morning for testing the map, and making a beautiful video demo of it. I really appreciate it my man!

That's it, have fun my people!

<embed width="430" height="389" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://s299.photobucket.com/flash/player.swf?file=http://vid299.photobucket.com/albums/mm300/blacksheep987/yeas-1.flv"></embed>

Map was created for 66 tic and airaccelerate of 150 may work fine with 100 tic but level 4 ramps may become glitched

Points System:

Fail on all levels is -1 to score
lvl 1 pass +3
lvl 2 pass +4
lvl 3 pass +5
lvl 4 pass +6
lvl 5 pass +7
Pacman 
   -no points on this game
Cannon Game 
     -amount of ring value player goes 
     though you get that amount of points to score
Bowl Over 
      -Each pin or person clutter is worth 10 points
Air Hockey
      -Puck in hole is 10 points
Slam-a-winner
      -Amount ball goes though is amount of points you get

Tips and Tricks

Level 1
     -Platform is on back of last pillar
Level 2
      -On the upward spiral be very small circle to make it 
      all the way to the top
Level 3
      -Crouch on first ramp
      -Criss-Cross on pillars
Level 4
     -Go when second moving ramp is at top of its climb
     -Stay on ramps as short as possible
Level 5 
     -Stay low on hole part
Pacman
     -Winner kill everyone before they collect the dots
     if they collect them all it kills you
Air Hockey
     -Controls are WASD and as you can guess the arrow is the front 
     so to go forward hold W and it will go in direction of arrow
Cannon Game
     -Direct your cannon at points that you want
     hit the load button
     then fire and wacth them fly
Bowl Over
      -Aim with the <- and -> buttons
      and hit the up one to fire
Slam-a-winner
      -? = 150 points to your score
      -Good luck
Jail 1 (spikes one)
      -deagle above spike pit yes you can get it
      -flashbangs and grenades at top of sides in middle
Jail 2 (ramp one)
      -Always be moving
Opening
      -DON'T PUSH THE BUTTON
      Make others do it for you
      And no you can't get out the window

Plot

It is a beautiful summer day so you and your friends decide to get together and go to the skill surf
park but when you get there it is closed 
You hear a window break, one of your more outgoing friends has broken in and everyone follows 

A VERY BIG SPECIAL THANKS TO BOUNTY CLAN FOR TESTING MY MAP 
 
Cred for name: 
  MercedesBenxx

I started this map not long ago just messing around in hammer. Its a small combat map with quite abit of surf. There wasnt a skybox on fpsbanana i liked to fit, so i used a standard skybox.

Each gun has around 30-90 ammo, there is only 1 way out of jail.

Any bugs or glitches you find please tell me :)

Thank you to the beta testers, spoz and Justin.uk.

surf_parrot_selector

a linear surf skill map


trailer:

<object width="300"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/bz94EXW1HiE&hl=en&fs=1&"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/bz94EXW1HiE&hl=en&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="300"></embed></object>

map notes:

- after 1 minute and 30 seconds you will start being teleported to jail when you fall off.
- after 5 minutes everyone will be teleported to jail, and given weapons.
- avery 30 seconds a portal within the jail will be activated for 10 seconds so players can escape.
- fall damage has been disabled
- there is two ends to this map, one which will teleport you to jail with a deagle and another further along after the "pro" section which will give you a choice of weapon before being teleported to the jail
- there are 3 hidden parrots that can be selected to activate "hard mode" on the next round (extended/extra obstacles, map can only be finished by beating the "pro" section. 

also i would highly recommend using noblock with this map

surf_park_releoded

This is the Final version of my map surf_park. Like in the first version red light means porter to T and blue porter to CT and as addition I have added letters in front of the porter. Green means porter to the new Top layer.

I have added a jail, you can escape from there if you hit the target in front of you with a smoke grenade.

Also I have added some secrets, two hidden buyzones and an adminroom wich can be reached by activating 4 buttons.

Like in the previous version the fall damage is turned off. 

I hope you will enjoy playing the map, if you put the map on your server it would be cool if you post your IP here ^^

Petersilie Superserver ( War / Surf ) 62.75.175.7:27015



Edit: Forgot to mention I am sorry for the big IP, but without the sign you would be able to see the admin room

surf_park

In the map red means the porter sends you to T spawn and blue means it sends you to the CT spawn.
Falldamage is turned off. 
There are only 4 types of weapons in the map ( AK, M4, M3 and AWP), each weapon has a full ammo. Only the awp just has 10 bullets, because I dont want people to camp with it ^^

There is no jail, because the map is so easy to surf so I think its not necessary. If you fall down the map just kills you ^^

This is my first map so please leave a comment and help me improve.

Final release : [Your text to link here...](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/161322 "http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/161322")

Hello and welcome to SURF _ PARC _ COLORE!

Map Data:
So this is a staged Skillsurf map with 6 Levels and 4 Bonus Levels. Every Level is based on a Color. The Bonus Levels are all different: 
the first is invcluded in the main map (Screen 1-3)
In the second Bonus i tried to make a new design and the "Birdcage-Bonus" was born. The third bonus was originally made for annother map more than a year ago. Now I just put it in this map because the other project was never finished. The forth Bonus Level is just a "broken" combination of the Levels 1 and 2 of surf_Sunset2.
I also added a fifth door at the bonus floor which gets open when sunset2 bonus is finished!
this is just a simple Funjump that is made for all guys who finished the map because it has no jail!

How it works:
You have to follow all rails with the same light-color of the start point to pass a Level. There is a √É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É¬Ø√Ç¬ø√Ç¬Ω√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬¢√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ω√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ωendplattform√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É¬Ø√Ç¬ø√Ç¬Ω√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬¢√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ω√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬ø√É∆í√Ø¬ø¬Ω√É‚Äö√Ç¬Ω for every Level in the same color like the lights. After touching this you can go to the center of the map. The the teleporter you used already at the spawn will teleport you to the next Level !

I hope you understand everything I wrote ^^
Good Luck and have fun playing this map :D

Also here is the Video of how to surf the map:

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/SgMd_2TxH2k" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

**SECOND UPDATE:Fixed bugs, slaymethods included. Also made 5 a whole lot prettier, and misc. additions overall. THIS OUGHT TO BE THE FINAL VERSION

**UPDATE AND NON-BETA:I have now made several changes to improve the map. I made a new jail from scratch(old one sucked) and made several small changes/improvements.
There's a secret nade in every stage now, go find them :)

Started at this map in December '08.
It is now bug-free(hopefully)! I hope you enjoy it.
The map consists of 5 stages and a jail.

The map was intended to be a pro surf map, and you've got 6 minutes to surf it before getting teleported to jail. The player(s) who surfed longest get weapons. If you complete it, some fancy slay methods become available.

*NOBLOCK IS REQUIRED

NEW VIDEO BY HELLRAISEDSURFER AND NITRO! THANKS A THON!
<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/mJQljr5nF-c&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/mJQljr5nF-c&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>

**Updated to v3b. Major update, including more secrets, retex'ing, new stuff, and more and stronger lights for the full effect. Try it!

UPDATE: THIS MAP IS NOW V3. I HAVE ADDED LIGHTS, AND MADE SMALL CHANGES OVERALL.
This map features:
-Two spawns in separate rooms. Spawnkilling is impossible, and spawncamping is idiotic.
-A big main room with ramps and stuff.
-Jail, where you end up if you fail the surfing. Located in the main room.
-The pro way, where the surfing is harder, but if you make it, you can teleport yourself to the uberjail, where you can either kill the prisoners, release them, or slay them with various entertaining methods.
- A chopper to fly around in.
-There's also secrets, ofcourse, but if i posted em here, they wouldn't be secrets anymore, no?

This is the final version. If you find bugs, or do you have ideas for my map, tell me. I won't promise i'll answer quickly, though, as I'm not often online here at FPSB. Instead, try posting it at eni-community.org, where I'm online pretty much every day.

CREDITS

g-flow for the skybox
UMBRELLAJackson for the chopper
The rest i made myself.
Enjoy my map!

Greets, Paragon.

I spent ALOT of time and effort making this, so please be fair and give me proper feedback. Also, play the map before you judge it. And if you can't beat it, don't comment on the stages you couldn't beat.

There a tons of secrets in the map, some are grenades stashed around. One secret bonus, and one bonus is available from spawn.

Jail version is coming, if there are any issues just report them to me through steam, ss or gamebanana.

Thanks a lot to Tilt and Junior for both the awesome bonuses!

Thanks to all of those who beta tested it for me!!

Special thanks to Ryan S for helping me with some ramp issues!

I appreciate it!

INFO:

5 stages, 2 bonuses
No timer
No Jail
Difficulty 1-7 = 4,5 
Lightmapscale: 48, 128 on less visible faces.
Max percentages used: 67,8% brushsides.
Time spent: 2 months.
